price: ߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߊ߬ ߞߊ߬ ߡߍ߲ ߘߊ߲߫ ߊ߬ ߕߴߏ߬ ߟߐ߲߫ ߘߍ߫ ، ߊ߬ߟߋ ߘߏ߲߬ ߸ ߡߐ߯ߡߐ߯ߒߕߋ ߟߋ߬ ߸ ߞߟߊ߬ߡߊ߬ߓߊ߮ ߟߋ߬
arabic: أَلَا يَعۡلَمُ مَنۡ خَلَقَ وَهُوَ ٱللَّطِيفُ ٱلۡخَبِيرُ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: alā yaʿlamu man khalaqa wahuwa al-laṭīfu al-khabīru
